title.rendered: Citywire profiles Neil Beaton, the last romantic in wealth management

excerpt.rendered: In a world of vertical integration, leveraged scale, unitised model portfolios and marginal production costs, Alvarium’s CIO stands out among his peers for his rejection of operative efficiency.
